title: Weird Bird Beaks
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 530 words, Level N (Grade 2), Lexile 600L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     H		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and R		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and R		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and R
description: Have you ever wondered why some birds have such weird beaks? Have you wondered how they can eat or fly with such oddly shaped beaks? Weird Bird Beaks provides insight as to why some birds have the weird beaks they do. Photographs support the text. Book and lesson also available at levels H and R.
meta: air pockets, beak, extinct, horn, shellfish, weird
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand nonfiction text
Compare and Contrast : Identify details to compare and contrast beaks
Vowel Digraphs : Read words with long /e/ digraphs
Adjectives : Identify adjectives and the nouns they describe

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
